case_name_full: The People of the State of New York v. Frank Campbell

opinions.opinion_text: —Judgment unanimously affirmed. Counsel’s motion to be relieved of assignment granted (see, People v Crawford, 71 AD2d 38). (Appeal from Judgment of Supreme Court, Monroe County, Mark, J. — Robbery, 2d Degree.) Present — Pine, J. P., Lawton, Hayes, Hurl-butt and Balio, JJ. (Filed Dec. 6, 1999.)

court_short_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York
court_full_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
